        public void setValue(double value)

        Parameters:

      • increment

        public void increment(int k,
             double amount)
        Increment a coordinate by a specified amount. A call to update is recommended afterwards.

        Parameters:
        k - the coordinate variable to change.
        amount - the amount to increment by.
